messages.subject: MAth Phobia
messages.msgSnippet: Ahh, right, Sandra! I d actually have to make a double line of the little balls and measure that to get a much better ballpark figure. Cool! See, math is
messages.messageBody:
Ahh, right, Sandra! I'd actually have to make a double line of the
little balls and measure that to get a much better ballpark figure.
Cool! See, math is better as social activity - for me anyway.

Debbie

> << Hmm... that is three
> measurements, the measure of three dimensions.... giving you voila! the
> volume of space in the room calculated in Ping-Pong balls. >>
>
> That would work if they were cubes, but won't a sphere fit down in the space
> left by four spheres together (on one plane, I mean) and shouldn't you get
> more ping-pong balls into a space than you would same-size cubes?
>
> Sandra
>
